scripts.// dev: Starts the Next.js development server with hot reloading for local work.
scripts.// start: Runs the pre-built production bundle on the configured port.
scripts.// lint: Validates the codebase with ESLint using Next.js defaults.
scripts.// typecheck: Optional script to verify TypeScript types without emitting output.
scripts.// lint:content: Validates seeded editorial content for SEO hygiene.
scripts.// check: Runs the full CI gate locally (lint, typecheck, build, content lint).
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run build && npm run lint:content
scripts.// test: Runs unit tests with Node's built-in test runner using ts-node for TypeScript support.
scripts.test: rm -rf .tests-dist && NODE_PATH=./stubs tsc -p tsconfig.tests.json && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('.tests-dist/package.json', '{\"type\":\"commonjs\"}')" && NODE_PATH=./stubs node -r ./scripts/register-test-paths.cjs .tests-dist/scripts/run-tests.js
scripts.// migrate:posts: One-off migration of Markdown or legacy JSX posts into Contentful.
scripts.// test:migration: Creates a sample blogPost entry to verify Contentful credentials end-to-end.
scripts.// clean-reinstall: Run `rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install` to refresh dependencies.
